Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.loggers

Class LogServiceLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.loggers.BaseLogger
      • com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.loggers.LogServiceLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filtered<LogEntry>, Flushable, Receiver<Transmittable>, NamedObject, Logger, Listener, Transceiver
    public class LogServiceLogger
extends BaseLogger
    A Java Services logger that creates loggers by inspecting the KIVAKIT_LOG and KIVAKIT_LOG_LEVEL environment variables. Log providers specified by comma separated descriptors in the KIVAKIT_LOG variable are loaded by LogServiceLoader as services. They are then configured and added to the list of logs. Configuration properties are specified as key value pairs. 
     -DKIVAKIT_LOG="console level=warning,file level=information location=log.txt"
    This command line sends warnings to the console and information messages (and higher) to the specified log file.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
